mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appointment(student, teacher, student_name, student_job, student_branch, planned_start_time, form) VALUES(#{studentId}, #{teacherId}, #{studentName},#{studentJob},#{studentBranch},#{plannedStartTime},#{form})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM appointment WHERE isDelete=0 AND isSend=0 AND state='agree' AND sign_in_time < #{endTime} AND sign_in_time >= #{startTime}
